document.full_text: josh smith finished two assists shy of a triple double and the atlanta hawks downed the chicago bulls 100-88 on sunday to tie the series at two games apiece.
document.title: hawks 100, bulls 88: hawks quiet critics, tying series with bulls
lines_and_colors: josh smith finished two assists shy of a triple double and the atlanta hawks downed the chicago bulls 100-88 on sunday to tie the series at two games apiece.
